sentences: Iori Nomizu (野水 伊織, Nomizu Iori, born October 18, 1985) is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer who provides voices for anime television series and video games.
Nomizu started her acting career portraying Moe Kagami in the Fuji TV live-action drama series Densha Otoko that was broadcast in July 2005.
In June 2006, she had a role in the TBS drama series Akihabara@Deep.
In 2011, Nomizu performed the opening theme song "Ma ka se te
Tonight" for the anime television adaptation of Is This a Zombie?.
In 2012, she formed a voice actor unit sweet ARMS with Misuzu Togashi, Kaori Sadohara, and Misato who co-starred in Upotte!!.
